Text:
MINIMUM PC REQUIREMENTS
Windows 98SE/2000/XP/vista/7
Pentium III or AMD AThlon 1GHz Processor
256MB RAM
DirectX compatible nVidia GeForce 3 or ATi Radeon 7500 Class Video Card
DirectX compatible Sound Card
DirectX 9.0c
16X CD-ROM Drive or 4X DVD-ROM Drive
2GB Hard Disk Space
Tested on windows 7 64 bits.
